summary: The module defines the core neural network building blocks of the UnivNet neural vocoder, including a generator that produces waveforms from mel‑spectrograms, several discriminator variants that evaluate generated audio at multiple periods and resolutions, a kernel predictor for location‑dependent convolutions, and supporting residual blocks. All components are implemented as NeMo NeuralModules with explicit input‑output type specifications for seamless integration into TTS pipelines.
business_intent: Provide reusable, high‑quality vocoder components that enable adversarial training of speech synthesis models, allowing developers to build and train state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑speech systems with fast, high‑fidelity waveform generation.
